description: Zomato APIs give you access to the freshest and most exhaustive information for over 1.5 million restaurants across 10,000 cities globally. With the Zomato APIs, you can : Search for restaurants by name, cuisine, or location; Display detailed information including ratings, location and cuisine;Use the Zomato Foodie Index to show great areas to dine in a city;

blocks.name: getAllCategories
blocks.description: Get a list of categories. List of all restaurants categorized under a particular restaurant type can be obtained using search endpoint with Category ID as inputs.

blocks.name: searchCity
blocks.description: Find the Zomato ID and other details for a city. City Name in the Search Query - Returns list of cities matching the query.

args.name: count
args.info: Number of max results to display.

blocks.name: getCitiesByCoordinates
blocks.description: Find the Zomato ID and other details for a city. Using coordinates - Identifies the city details based on the coordinates of any location inside a city.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The latitude and longitude of the find place.

args.name: count
args.info: Number of max results to display.

blocks.name: getCities
blocks.description: If you already know the Zomato City ID, this endpoint can be used to get other details of the city.

blocks.name: getCollection
blocks.description: Returns Zomato Restaurant Collections in a City by cityId.

args.name: count
args.info: Number of max results to display.

blocks.name: getCollectionsByCoordinates
blocks.description: Returns Zomato Restaurant Collections in a City by coordinates.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The latitude and longitude of the find place.

args.name: count
args.info: Number of max results to display.

blocks.name: getCuisines
blocks.description: Get a list of all cuisines of restaurants listed in a city by cityId.

blocks.name: getCuisinesByCoordinates
blocks.description: Get a list of all cuisines of restaurants listed in a city by coordinates.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The latitude and longitude of the find place.

blocks.name: getEstablishments
blocks.description: Get a list of restaurant types in a city by id.

blocks.name: getEstablishmentsByCoordinates
blocks.description: Get a list of restaurant types in a city by coordinates.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The latitude and longitude of the find place.

blocks.name: getLocationDetailsByCoordinates
blocks.description: Get Foodie and Nightlife Index, list of popular cuisines and nearby restaurants around the given coordinates.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The latitude and longitude of the find place.

blocks.name: searchLocation
blocks.description: Search for Zomato locations by keyword.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: Provide coordinates to get better search results.

args.name: count
args.info: Number of max results to display.Default:1.

blocks.name: getLocationDetails
blocks.description: Get Foodie Index, Nightlife Index, Top Cuisines and Best rated restaurants in a given location.

args.name: entityId
args.info: Location id obtained from getLocation... endpoints.

args.name: entityType
args.info: Location type obtained from getLocation... endpoints.

blocks.name: getDailyMenu
blocks.description: Get daily menu using Zomato restaurant ID.

args.name: restaurantId
args.info: Id of restaurant whose details are requested.

blocks.name: getRestaurant
blocks.description: Get detailed restaurant information using Zomato restaurant ID.

args.name: restaurantId
args.info: Id of restaurant whose details are requested.

blocks.name: getReviews
blocks.description: Get restaurant reviews using the Zomato restaurant ID. Only 5 latest reviews are available under the Basic API plan.

args.name: restaurantId
args.info: Id of restaurant whose details are requested.

args.name: count
args.info: Number of max results to display.

blocks.name: search
blocks.description: The location input can be specified using Zomato location ID or coordinates. Cuisine / Establishment / Collection IDs can be obtained from respective api calls.More in REDME.

args.name: entityType
args.info: Location type obtained from getLocation... endpoints.

args.name: count
args.info: Number of max results to display.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The latitude and longitude of the find place.

args.name: radiusSearch
args.info: Radius around (lat,lon); to define search area, defined in meters(M).

args.name: establishmentId
args.info: Establishment id obtained from getEstablishments or getEstablishmentsByCoordinates endpoints.

args.name: collectionId
args.info: Collection id obtained from getCollection or getCollectionById endpoint.

args.name: categoryId
args.info: Category id obtained from getCategories endpoint.

args.name: order
args.info: used with 'sort' parameter to order results.
